title: Khalid A. Al-Falih
summary: Khalid A. Al-Falih (Arabic: خالد الفالح Ḫālid al-Fāliḥ; born 1960) is Minister of Investment of Saudi Arabia since 25 February 2020. He served as Minister of Energy of Saudi Arabia and chairman of Saudi Aramco. He also has previously served as the Saudi Arabian Health Minister and Aramco's CEO.
